episodes.title: Chloe Driver Talks About Her Case & Benyamin - 12/12/2024 Jail Call
episodes.description:
Check out PCFP playlists for more inmate calls including Chris Watts, Wade Wilson and more- https://www.youtube.com/@PhoneCallsFromPrison/playlists

Case summary-
-Chloe Driver, 24, was convicted of malice murder, felony murder, child cruelty, and aggravated assault for the 2020 death of her 13-month-old daughter, Hannah Nicole Driver.
-Prosecutors argued that Chloe Driver deliberately planned the murder of her 13-month-old daughter to gain more attention from her cult leader boyfriend, who had multiple wives.
-Deemed guilty but mentally ill, Driver received a life sentence with the possibility of parole, along with an additional 20 years to be served concurrently.

These calls were acquired and paid for by this channel through FOIA.
The calls have been edited by this channel to meet YouTube guidelines and for listening purposes only. 
I was informed that the date could vary by 24 hours due to a glitch in the system.

If you would like to support the channel, you can become a member here-
https://www.youtube.com/@PhoneCallsFromPrison/join
or you can also donate here-
cash app: $PhoneCallsFromPrison
You can also join Patreon here for exclusive calls- https://www.patreon.com/PhoneCallsFromPrison

#chloedriver #cultmom #jailcalls
